main.name: Garrett Grahl
main.description: Design. Build. Evolve. It's what I do
main.bio: Do you dream of hiring a versatile developer who is capable of learning beyond what is assumed to be normal? Look no further. I have worked in the Ethereum ecosystem building secured, decentralized apps, React websites, Java programs, utilized Mongo DB, from back end to front end. What makes me even more versatile is my abilitiy to communicate and work well with all people. I am just searching for my fit in a vast ecosystem of developers.
main.contactmessage: Interested in contacting me? Send me a message below.

resume.skillmessage: Over the last year I have strived to get up-to-date with current programming best practices, frameworks, libraries, and consumer demands.

education.description: Computer Science 101, Web Design, Algorithms, Basic Design and Implementation, Team Oriented Projects, Data Structures, Four Brothers Design Patterns
Development of smart contracts on the Ethereum Blockchain, using best practices, secure implementation, attack vestors, unit testing, and web integration.
University of Helsinki JavaScript-based web development covering: React, Redux, Node.js, MongoDB, REST API's, Node.js

education.degree: Ethereum and Solidity, Java Programming Masterclass, The Complete JavaScript Course
education.description: Learned additional skills in Java, JavaScript, Solidity, HTML, CSS, Node.js, Unit Testing, and much more.

work.title: Stock News Alert System
work.description: Java driven program that connects to a News API to scrape for newly posted articles. The program archives the articles and sends recipients the newest news via SMS.

work.title: Splitter DApp
work.description: Transaction splitting, decentralized application hosted on Infura and Heroku, running on an Ethereum testnet blockchain. A sender uses Metamask to send an equally split amount to two recipients.

projects.title: Splitter
projects.category: Transaction Splitter smart contract on Ethereum

testimonials.text: Trust in the lord with all your heart, And lean not on your own understanding; In all your ways acknowledge Him, and He shall direct your paths.
